member.name: T:UAOOI.Windows.GUIAbstractions.ICanBeAccepted
member.summary: This interface is used by internal component to inform parent window that it is possible to enable accept button.

member.name: M:UAOOI.Windows.GUIAbstractions.ICanBeAccepted.CanBeAccepted(System.Boolean)
member.summary: It sets the information if accept button in the parent dialog window can be accepted
member.param: true if it could be accepted
